name: Tilt'N'Turn
description:
Guide the yellow ball to the blue exit by rotating the level. Sometimes there are green gems dotted around which must be collected to activate the exit. Other times there are multiple balls - the last ball will not exit until all green gems are collected. Avoid hitting explosive mines with the ball!

Look for the following Easter Eggs: cat, hat and infinity symbol

Note: allow the game to load before pressing the fullscreen button, otherwise the display might appear messed up.

Made for Anything Goes Jam [8 Bits to Infinity]
